Ultimately, assessing risk means that anything in the workplace that could cause harm to EPAM employees, other employees and people (including customers, visitors and members of the public) is carefully examined. This allows EPAM to estimate the severity of risk and decide whether the risk is acceptable or whether more precautions need to be taken to prevent harm.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The employer is required to implement any improvements considered necessary by the risk assessment.
